SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
0.1.2 -fix resolution parsing and sorting algorithm to accept non integer (ie float/double) frame per second (FPS) values in the resolution description. -fix resolution parsing and sorting algorithm to accept and sort properly prepended text in the resolution description.
0.1.1 -Initial Release
